data.name: Spelling help
data.description:
Peter often misspells certain words in the same way(instead of ``length`` Peter types ``lenght``).
Your task is now to help Peter with writing a program correcting his mistakes automatically.

The input will be a string containing text and a string array containing correct words.

Array format: ``[[wrong,right]]``

Example:


```python
switch("The lenght is 12 m", [["lenght","length"]] )
switch("The lenght is 12 m, and it shoots within a rnage of 50km", [["lenght","length"],["rnage","range"]] )
```

(misspelled is defined by matching the first element of the subarray)

I dont remember a kata like this -> if im wrong please tell me
